price: Na uchungu wa kutoka roho utamjia kwa haki. Hayo ndiyo uliyo kuwa ukiyakimbia.
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ سَكۡرَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنۡهُ تَحِيدُ
footnotes: Na yatapo kuja machungu ya kukata roho, kwa haki isiyo na shaka ndani yake, hilo ni jambo la kweli ulilo kuwa ukilikimbia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wajāat sakratu al-mawti bil-ḥaqi dhālika mā kunta min'hu taḥīdu
